author: jwasinger
content: is anyone here aware if there is an EVM implementation of bn128 ecrecover?

author: mratsim
content: ECRECOVER is only for ECDSA signatures. BN128/254/256 is attractive due to BLS signatures

author: jwasinger
content: ah whoops.  got confused.  ecrecover precompile is for secp256k1..  my corrected question would be:  is anyone aware of an EVM implementation that corresponds to the ecrecover precompile?

author: mratsim
content: Since all clients use libsecp256k1 I'm pretty sure they just call libsecp256k1 underneath but maybe py_ecc has a generic one.
